item.description: Join us on Saturday, September 17, from 10:30 a.m. until 12:00 noon for a walk on a walking/jogging trail in Woodbridge followed by optional lunch. Fitzgerald Trails is located at 100 Center Road in Woodbridge, Connecticut, and there’s plenty of parking at the Woodbridge Town Library at 10 Newton Road. We will meet on the trail next to the intersection of Center Rd (Route 114) and Beecher Rd. If you arrive after 10:30 a.m., just wait at this location and you will see us in a few minutes as we walk around the track, or you can call one of the mobile numbers below. The event will be canceled in the event of rain. If in doubt about the weather, contact Manny Ratafia: e-mail: manny@ratafias.com, home (203) 387-7348, cell (203) 901-9553; or Nina Stein: home (203) 757-2539, cell (203) 215-0022; or Marsha Zellner: home (203) 393-2816, cell (203) 494-3856.
item.name: Woodbridge Walk
